attributes.action: Bring the cost of space raiders Back down to 10p
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Space raiders have been a part of British culture for years bringin joy to children and adults alike for there 10p price now that the price has been raised to 15p people will be forced to seek out other cheaper corn based snacks. There for space raiders will soon be a long forgotten part of our culture. Please help us raise awarness of this issue and protect some of the few things we brits have left.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
